WRITING.TITLE: I can only think of one thing worse than Trump with his finger on the nuclear trigger.
WRITING.TEXT: Micheal J Fox with his finger on the nuclear trigger.

WRITING.TITLE: 20,000 Dots
WRITING.TEXT: Your assignment was to produce a piece containing exactly 20,000 dots, my Art teacher said, but I only see one. Theyre on top of each other. I explained.

WRITING.TITLE: I took a girl back to my house for sex last night.
WRITING.TEXT:
After going upstairs, I slowly removed my clothes and climbed under the quilt.
Youll have to be really quiet, I whispered, My mum dad are asleep.
I can see that, she said, Have you not got your own bed?

WRITING.TITLE: If you lose one sense, your other senses are enhanced.
WRITING.TEXT: Thats why people with no sense of humour have an increased sense of self-importance.

WRITING.TITLE: My friend said to me the other day I think Im going to commit suicide!
WRITING.TEXT:
I replied Bet you a 100 you dont
I still have that 100.

WRITING.TITLE: North Korea plans nuclear attack targeting US
WRITING.TEXT: At first I was alarmed at reading this, then I realised they meant United States.

I walked in the lounge to find my wife breastfeeding our son.
How long do you have to do that for? I asked. When is he too old for it?
Well, its a physical bond between a mother and her child isnt it? Its only society that deems it unacceptable above a certain age.
Yeah, shut up Joe I was talking to your mother.
